library.description: An Open-Source JavaScript Library for Mobile-Friendly Interactive Maps.
library.name: Leaflet

library.description: gmaps.js allows you to use the potential of Google Maps in a simple way. No more extensive documentation or large amount of code.
library.name: gmaps.js

library.description: OpenLayers makes it easy to put a dynamic map in any web page. It can display map tiles and markers loaded from any source. OpenLayers has been developed to further the use of geographic information of all kinds.
library.name: OpenLayers

library.description: Polymaps is a free JavaScript library for making dynamic, interactive maps in modern web browsers. Polymaps provides speedy display of multi-zoom datasets over maps, and supports a variety of visual presentations for tiled vector data, in addition to the usual cartography from OpenStreetMap, CloudMade, Bing, and other providers of image-based web maps.
library.name: Polymaps

library.description: A JavaScript library for creating interactive maps based on Kartograph.py SVG maps.
library.name: Kartograph.js

library.description: persistence.js is a asynchronous Javascript object-relational mapper library. It can be used both in the web browser and on the server using node.js.
library.name: persistence.js

library.description: Mapstraction is a programming library that provides a common interface for numerous javascript mapping libraries to enable switching from one to another as smoothly as possible. Developers can code their web applications once, and then easily switch the mapping provider based on project needs, terms and conditions, and new functionality.
library.name: Mapstraction

library.description:
jVectorMap is a jQuery plugin employed to show vector maps and visualize data on HTML pages.
It uses SVG in all modern browsers like Firefox 3 or 4, Safari, Chrome, Opera, IE9, while legacy support for older versions of IE from 6 to 8 is provided with VML.
library.name: jVectorMap

library.description: jQuery Geo, an open-source geospatial mapping project from AppGeo, provides a streamlined JavaScript API for a large percentage of your online mapping needs. Whether you just want to display a map on a wep page as quickly as possible or you are a more advanced GIS user, jQuery Geo can help!
library.name: jQuery Geo

library.description: With jHERE, you can easily add interactive maps to your website. In only 4KB (1.95KB Gzipped), you get a powerful map API, highly customizable markers, event handling and info bubbles. Bonus features are KML support and data visualization via heatmaps.
library.name: jHERE

library.description: OSM Buildings - A JavaScript library for visualizing 3D building geometry on interactive maps
library.name: OSM Buildings

library.description: Makes Google Maps markers move naturally in animated way
library.name: marker-animate-unobtrusive

library.description:
AnyMap JavaScript mapping library helps you build interactive maps that look great in any browser on any platform.

AnyMap is perfect for interactive dashboards and side-by-side reporting. You can use it to display sales by region, election results, population density or any other geo-related data.

AnyMap JS maps are absolutely compatible with basic charts, stock charts and Gantt charts also offered by AnyChart http://www.anychart.com, and can be used as part of the dashboard as good as standalone map visualization solution.

AnyMap comes with ready-to-use Maps Collection which you can use at no additional cost. Custom maps can be created from any SHP map.
library.name: AnyMap JS

library.description: jump is a light weight maps library that works on its own, meaning, it is not a wrapper for OpenLayers or GoogleMaps API. Currently it is under development, but a lot of essential features work well.
library.name: jump
jQuery Subway Map

library.description: amMap is a robust interactive Javascript/HTML5 maps library
library.name: amMap

library.description: ArcGIS API for JavaScript is an API to create interactive maps and apps and share them with the rest of your organization. Be productive right away with ready-to-use content, apps and templates available for the web, smartphones, and tablets.
library.name: ArcGIS API for JavaScript
